Package com.example.eventlottery.admin

package com.example.eventlottery.admin
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.eventlottery
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminAllEventsFragment
    Fragment that allows an admin user to view all events in the system.
    AdminEditProfileFragment
    A fragment that allows administrators to edit another user's profile information, including their name, email, phone, role, and organizer status.
    AdminEntrantAdapter
    A ListAdapter for displaying a list of Profile objects for administrative purposes.
    AdminEntrantsFragment
    An admin-only screen that displays a list of all user profiles for moderation.
    AdminEventImagesAdapter
    A ListAdapter for displaying a grid of event poster images for administrative review.
    AdminEventImagesFragment
    An admin-only screen that displays a grid of all event posters for review and moderation.
    AdminGate
    Utility class to determine if the current device user is an administrator.
    AdminNotificationAdapter
    A ListAdapter for displaying a list of NotificationLogEntry items for administrators.
    AdminNotificationsFragment
    An admin-only screen that displays a list of notifications sent by organizers.
